story.text: WASHINGTON Jan 3 Landstar System Inc. (LSTR.O) said on Wednesday that its chief financial officer will share his title and will in June become an adviser to the trucking company. Robert LaRose signed an agreement with the company to become co-CFO as of Jan. 2 and to cease being an executive officer and become a special adviser to the chief executive on June 1, according to a regulatory filing. The term of his employment will expire on Dec. 31, 2008. Landstar appointed James Gattoni, the corporate controller, as co-CFO and principal accounting officer.
story.title: landstar cfo to share title , become adviser
